achievementAdescription: “The secret of getting ahead is getting started.” – Mark Twain
achievementBdescription: “If you work on something a little bit every day, you end up with something that is massive.” – Kenneth Goldsmith
achievementCdescription: “Work hard in silence, let your success be the noise.” – Frank Ocean
achievementDdescription: “A winner is a dreamer who never gives up.” – Nelson Mandela
achievementFdescription: “Dreams don’t work unless you do.” – John C. Maxwell
achievementGdescription: Don’t dream about success. Get out there and work for it.
achievementHdescription: “I didn’t get there by wishing for it, but by working for it.” – Estee Lauder
achievementIdescription: “Focus on being productive instead of busy.” – Tim Ferriss
achievementJdescription: Keep on it, you're doing well!
achievementKdescription: “If you can dream it, you can do it.” – Walt Disney
achievementLdescription: “You can do anything you set your mind to.” – Benjamin Franklin
achievementMdescription: “If you want to fly give up everything that weighs you down.” – Buddha
